name: it-tools
tagline: A collection of web based utilities for developers and system admins
description: IT Tools is a collection of handy web tools for developers and system administrators, such as encoders, hashers, JWT decoders and network utilities. It can be self hosted as an all in one Swiss army knife for everyday tasks.

features.title: Encoding Tools
features.description: Base64, URL, HTML encoding and decoding utilities

features.title: Hash Generators
features.description: MD5, SHA, and other cryptographic hash functions

features.title: Jwt Tools
features.description: Decode, verify, and generate JSON Web Tokens

features.title: Text Utilities
features.description: Case conversion, diff checker, regex tester, and more

features.title: Network Tools
features.description: IP calculator, DNS lookup, and network diagnostics

features.title: Data Converters
features.description: JSON, YAML, XML, and other format conversions

features.title: Uuid Generator
features.description: Create UUIDs and other unique identifiers

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: 80+ tools in a single, self-hosted web application
